## hasFallback() function

Check if a declaration has a fallback. Returns true if a declaration with the same property name appears before the current declaration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hasFallback(node: Declaration): boolean;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

{<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} Whether the declaration has a fallback
